    • Constructor Detail

      • Test

        public Test(java.lang.String testDir,
    java.lang.String outDir)
        Parameters:
        testDir - The directory that holds the test definitions such as tests, C_tests, and KAT files
        outDir - The directory that will contain all of the generated tests. If this directory doesn't exist, it will be created. Some exisiting files in this directory may be overwritten

    • Method Detail

      • generateLanguageTests

        public void generateLanguageTests()
        Generates tests for each language specified in the tests files. Each of these language must have a "language"_tests file defined in testDir
